name: eoss-edrive
short_description:
eDrive 0.3.0 is now available

From this version we will support more client functionality on top of Synchronisation.


Unzip the edrive zip to a directory of you choice and execute the bin edrive.bat or edrive.sh.

The config directory contains an empty eDrive.json file and a demo eDrive.pass file. There is also an eDrive.json.example file you can use as a reference for setting up a single Synchroniser.

eDrive is highly configurable allowing you to Synchronise multiple Directory Structures to Multiple CMIS Repositories.

It has a simple inbuilt Command Server as well as a Multicast Server that multicasts events that clients can react to.

NOTE : You do not need to use the Command server interface as ALL settings can be made by hand directly into the JSON configuration file you defined using the -Dedrive.config.file=<JSON file>

Please read the README.txt file for details on how to setup and use.

Comments are always appreciated.
